alert.note: Alert for Escambia; Santa Rosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 4:19PM EDT until June 13 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Escambia County in south central Alabama... Northwestern Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... North central Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 319 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Atmore, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Atmore, Century, Flomaton, Jay, Pollard, Bratt, I65 And CR 1 and I65 And AL 21. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
